attributes.action: Make apple create more wood related emojis
attributes.additional_details:
The only emojis that include some type of wood are:
🌲🌳🌴🎄🏓🏸🏒🏑🏏⛳️🎿⛷🏂🏹🎣🚣🏻🏄🏼🎨🎬🏝🏖🏡🕰🔨⚒🛠⛏⚰🚪🖼
The majority barely including wood at all.
This is discrimination against wood.
If there was a lack of white people in the emojis people would care so why not wood.
#WoodLivesMatter
If it wasn't for wood we wouldn't be here so be more grateful.
There needs to be more.
Spread the hashtag #WoodWillWin to show your support.
attributes.background: Me and my friend were recently reviewing the emojis available and I think that it is an absolute disgrace that there are very few that feature the infamous sustainable material that helps our world thrive-wood. It helps our world thrive therefore we should put a spotlight on it. #WoodWillWin

rejection.details: The issue you raise is the responsibility of Apple, not of the UK Government or Parliament.
